message: Weird issue can't find a solution. I upgraded an app from 3.0.10 to 3.1, but now, whenever I have an order by clause, in a scope or wherever, I get a stack level too deep error.. Anyone else experienced anything like this? Previously I upgraded this app from rails 2.3.x to 3.0.10 if that makes a difference....
So found the culprit. It was the rd_searchlogic gem. Should of looked into gem issues first I guess. Just in case someone has a similar error...
